new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-01 15:00:00) positions.

Here’s today’s portfolio analysis and update (2025-10-01 15:00:00)

Step 1 — Read positions and today’s prices
- Positions: AAPL 7, AMZN 8, MU 8, Cash $37.20
- Current prices used (from provided feed):
  - AAPL $256.74
  - AMZN $221.93
  - MU $179.7499

Step 2 — Update valuation and current weights
- AAPL: 7 x 256.74 = $1,797.18
- AMZN: 8 x 221.93 = $1,775.44
- MU: 8 x 179.7499 = $1,437.9992
- Equity total = $5,010.62
- Cash = $37.20
- Portfolio total = $5,047.82

Weights
- AAPL: 1,797.18 / 5,047.82 = 35.62%
- AMZN: 1,775.44 / 5,047.82 = 35.18%
- MU: 1,437.9992 / 5,047.82 = 28.50%
- Cash: 0.74%

Step 3 — Market/news and sentiment check (tools used)
- Macro/market backdrop
  - Stocks firmer as softer jobs data boosts Fed cut hopes (FinancialJuice, 2025-10-01).
- Apple (AAPL)
  - Ongoing positive narrative around massive buybacks and shareholder returns (Forbes, 2025-10-01).
  - Recent reporting shows accelerating Services growth; Sept qtr Services +15% to record (AOL Finance, 2025-10-30), supportive into year-end.
- Amazon (AMZN)
  - Prime Big Deal Days scheduled Oct 7–8 (About Amazon page live). Near-term retail catalyst; AWS continues to push GenAI ecosystem (TechCrunch, 2025-10-15).
- Micron (MU)
  - DRAM/NAND contract prices rising; HBM-driven demand supportive for memory cycle (MK Business Daily, 2025-10-01).
  - TrendForce/Evertiq indicates tight server DRAM supply into Q4’25 (Evertiq, 2025-10-30).
- Note: Attempted X/Reddit sentiment scrapes; direct site-scope queries returned no results due to data/API limitations, but broader news sources corroborate constructive sentiment for all three names.

Step 4 — Decision and any trades
- Rationale:
  - AAPL: Positive services momentum and ongoing buybacks; hold through late-Oct earnings.
  - AMZN: Near-term Oct 7–8 retail event plus AWS GenAI momentum; hold to capture catalyst.
  - MU: Memory upcycle (DRAM/NAND/HBM) supports margin/ASP; hold for continued cycle tailwinds.
- Cash on hand (~$37) is insufficient to add meaningful size. Portfolio is already reasonably balanced across the three positions. No rebalance warranted today.
- Action: No trades. Positions unchanged.

Step 5 — What we’ll watch next
- AMZN: Prime Big Deal Days (Oct 7–8) performance commentary; any AWS update cadence.
- AAPL: Late-Oct earnings date and Services/iPhone commentary.
- MU/memory complex: Continued DRAM/NAND pricing prints and HBM supply developments.

Summary
- Today’s portfolio value: $5,047.82
- Allocation: AAPL 35.62%, AMZN 35.18%, MU 28.50%, Cash 0.74%
- Trades executed: None (hold all positions)

<FINISH_SIGNAL>

URL: https://www.mk.co.kr/en/business/11434307
Title: Expectations for a semiconductor boom are growing as prices of memory semiconductors such as DRAM an.. - MK
Description: Expectations for a semiconductor boom are growing as prices of memory semiconductors such as DRAM and NAND flash rise in the global semiconductor market. In particular, as demand for high-bandwidth me..
Publish Time: 2025-10-01T17:39:34+09:00
Content: ![Image 1: 사진설명](https://wimg.mk.co.kr/news/cms/202510/02/20251002_01160113000002_L00.jpg)

Expectations for a semiconductor boom are growing as prices of memory semiconductors such as DRAM and NAND flash rise in the global semiconductor market. In particular, as demand for high-bandwidth memory (HBM) explodes due to the boom in artificial intelligence (AI) data centers, domestic memory semiconductor companies have benefited, and general-purpose memory prices have risen, bringing unprecedented "triple strength" to the Korean semiconductor industry.

According to memory price analysis company DRAMExchange, the price of DDR5 16Gb based on the contract price recorded $6.10 as of the 30th of last month, soaring 16.19% from $5.25 at the end of August. Based on the average price of DRAM, it has risen for six consecutive months and is entering a full-fledged upward trend.

The NAND flash memory contract price also jumped 16.59% from $2.05 to $2.39 based on 32Gb MLC. NAND flash memory, which h...

URL: https://techcrunch.com/sponsor/amazon-web-services/aws-generative-ai-accelerator-cohort-announcement-2025/
Title: AWS Generative AI Accelerator Cohort Announcement 2025 | TechCrunch
Description: 
Publish Time: 2025-10-15T16:10:28Z
Content: Introducing the 40 startups selected from around the world for the 2025 AWS Generative AI Accelerator
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

_Meet the next generation of startups from across the globe expanding the scope of what’s possible with generative AI and AWS._

AWS is proud to announce the 40 startups participating in the 2025 global AWS Generative AI Accelerator Cohort. This initiative is a key part of our $230 million [commitment](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/startups/accelerating-the-next-wave-of-generative-ai-startups/) to enrich the landscape of generative AI by fostering the next generation of pioneers, helping them turn ambitious ideas into transformative solutions that shape the future of technology.

The program kicks off October 14 at our Amazon HQ in Seattle with learning, mentorship, and leadership from AWS domain experts as well as a curated network of industry leaders and experts from top AI companies...
